name: AlienInvaders
0:
”Alexa, open Alien Invaders”
”Alexa, play Alien Invaders”
”Alexa, start Alien Invaders”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: alien invaders
des:
Your mission is to fly your spaceship to the planet Mars that has a colony of cats. Unfortunately they cats have been overrun by aliens and need to be saved. Using your echo buttons, go onto an adventure to save the cats!
 
Just press two Echo buttons to get started, then listen carefully to the sounds played.

If you hear an alien, press the red button and you will zap it with your laser.
If you hear a cat, press the blue button to save it, and move on to the next sound.

The game tracks how many cats you can save. If you can find ten to bring home on your spaceship, you will win the game!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
